https://moirai2.github.io/schema/daemon/: studyid=`esearch -db gds -query $userdefinedid | elink -target sra | efetch -start 1 -stop 2 | xtract -pattern EXPERIMENT -element STUDY_REF@accession | sort -u`
studyid=`esearch -db biosample -query $userdefinedid | elink -target sra | efetch -start 1 -stop 2 | xtract -pattern EXPERIMENT -element STUDY_REF@accession | sort -u`
